Experiment_description: The experiments focus on testing different supervised learning pipelines for processing symbolic token sequences on the SPR_BENCH dataset. Node d7ac6bdce5f04c6582e435c789d604b6 uses an Embedding + GRU model, while nodes 66e67345d9a8412a9cfbac8c0c044a67, 2c8c226ca6f64bc0964989d8bef1a88f, and cfd7fc617253463b9f48242d1bd2102e use mean-pooling and linear classification.
Significance: These experiments are significant because they provide insights into model architectures that improve generalization and reduce overfitting in sequence classification tasks. The findings could guide the development of more robust models in future stages, particularly with extensions involving self-supervised learning.
Description: Each experiment involves converting symbolic tokens to indices, padding sequences, embedding, pooling, and using linear classification. Metrics such as Macro-F1, SWA, and CWA are tracked. The experiments emphasize operational robustness, ensuring data handling and device management are efficient.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot shows the training and validation loss for the SPR_BENCH dataset over five epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The increase in validation loss after the third epoch suggests overfitting, indicating the model may not generalize well to unseen data after prolonged training.

List_of_included_plots.description: This plot shows the training and validation cross-entropy loss over five epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The consistent decrease in validation loss suggests good generalization and effective learning without overfitting.

List_of_included_plots.description: The macro-F1 scores for both training and validation sets show improvement over the epochs.
List_of_included_plots.analysis: The higher validation macro-F1 compared to training suggests the model generalizes well to unseen data.

Key_numerical_results.description: Final Macro-F1 score on the test set for node d7ac6bdce5f04c6582e435c789d604b6.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: The low score indicates poor generalization and effectiveness of the GRU-based model.

Key_numerical_results.description: Final Macro-F1 score on the validation set for node 2c8c226ca6f64bc0964989d8bef1a88f.
Key_numerical_results.analysis: The highest score among the experiments, suggesting effective model and parameter choice for generalization.
The low and stable loss indicates robust learning and minimal overfitting.
